price: আৰু যি আকৃতিত বিচাৰিছে, তেওঁ তোমাক (সেই আকৃতিতে) গঠন কৰিছে।
arabic: فِيٓ أَيِّ صُورَةٖ مَّا شَآءَ رَكَّبَكَ

version.title: Assamese translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Assamese by Sh. Rafiqul-Islam Habib Ar-Rahman in 1438 H.

meta.transliteration: fī ayyi ṣūratin mā shāa rakkabaka
